articles.author: Matt Viser
articles.title: Biden visits Amazon rainforest, a first for an American president - The Washington Post
articles.description: Biden’s emphasis on climate change during his trip creates yet another contrast with Trump as the president prepares to leave office.
articles.content: MANAUS, Brazil President Joe Biden stopped Sunday in this city in the heart of the rainforest, marking the first time a sitting U.S. president has visited the Amazon, as he sought to emphasize the im… [+122 chars]
